name: Apple Watch Realistic Mockup Template with Straps
description:
I'm really excited sharing this template with you all. Been enjoying making this file.


This template is built with Variants to change the color of the straps.


There are two main use of this template:


Grid View Template

This template can showcase your app icon in the grid view homescreen.


Design Template

This template can showcase your app design with realistic Apple Watch device frames.


This is a WIP (work in progress), so please send me a message if you have any suggestion of other components you may need! You can send me a message via Twitter @josedevian


Buy me a coffee☕️: buymeacoffee.com/josedevian/

Update (6/3/'21):

The biggest update yet, currently supporting all available Apple Watch styles including the newly released International Collection Sport Loop and 2021 Pride Edition Braided Solo Loop.


In order to keep the file size small, I've decided to change on how you can change the watch's styles. Instead of relying fully on Variants, now you need to click on the individual case and strap layer to switch to other case finishes or strap styles and colors.


New case finishes:

  1. Stainless Steel: Graphite, Silver, Gold, Space Black
  2. Titanium: Titanium, Space Black Titanium


New strap styles:

  1. Updated Sport Band colors
  2. Solo Loop
  3. Braided Solo Loop
  4. Sport Loop
  5. International Collection Sport Loop
  6. Nike Sport Band
  7. Nike Sport Loop
  8. Hermès
  9. Stainless Steel
  10. Leather Link
  11. Leather Loop


Thank you all for the likes and the downloads! Feel free to contact me if you have any issue on how to use the file or if you need additional components/screens to be added.
